mapper.select: select title, content, category, nickname, board_id, write_date, b.username, view_cnt from board b join users u on u.username=b.username where deleted_dt is null and board_id=#{board_id}

select title, category, nickname, board_id , write_date from board b join users u on u.username=b.username where board_id in ( select max(board_id) from board where deleted_dt is null and board_id < #{board_id} union select min(board_id) from board where deleted_dt is null and board_id > #{board_id} )
mapper.update: update board b join (select coalesce(max(view_cnt), 0) as max_viewcnt from board where board_id = #{board_id}) as self set b.view_cnt = self.max_viewcnt + 1 where b.board_id = #{board_id};
mapper.select: select * from board where deleted_dt is not null
